title: The voyages & travels of Sir John Mandevile, Knight wherein is set down the way to the Holy Land, and to Hierusalem, as also to the lands of the great Caan, and of Prestor John, to Inde, and divers other countries : together with many strange marvels therein.
author: Mandeville, John, Sir.
publisher: Printed for R. Scott, T. Basset, J. Wright, and R. Chiswel,
